extendedInfo.description: Best "Screenshot" App on the market GUARANTEED. 100% Money back if you're not satisfied! **Special Promotion JUST $.99!! Buy now before it goes back to $2.99!**Screenshot and Draw is designed to give you more of what you want, for less! We offer multi-shot mode which allows you to screen capture multiple images and merge them together! This is useful for capturing your entire background, SMS conversation, or even games!*****IF YOUR PHONE IS NOT ROOTED YOU MUST INSTALL A FILE to give permission for the app to work. More info below**********If your phone does not have an SD card slot it will not work. If you are unsure please try the trial app*****With Screenshot and Draw you can take a screen shot, draw something on it, share it, and even merge multiple screenshots together to show off all of your cool apps! We provide you with more features than âscreenshot uxâ and âscreenshot itâ and we do it for a lot less money! Screenshot and Draw not only works for rooted phones but it works for non-rooted phones as well. If your phone is not rooted then simply download a small batch file, run it on your computer, and youâre in business! Taking a screen capture is not only a fun way to show your friends what you have on your phone but it is also a great business tool. Many Developers have agreed that Screenshot and Draw provides them with the features they need to get the job done. Screen capture your Android device the easy way.Features:-Screenshot from statusbar-Shake to screenshot-On screen camera button to screen shot-Merge Photos (up to 5) â May be less depending on phones capabilities-Draw on photos â Yes, even draw over you 5 screen merge of your entire phone!-Crop, text over screen capture, share, email, post on facebook or other social media-Choose custom save locationYou can even screen capture your favorite games such as Angry Birds and Cut the Rope. Set the multi-shot interval to 0 seconds to get action shots of your games. You can even merge these screenshots together and get an image of the action.Screenshot and Draw was produces by Condition Delta apps and we stand behind all of our products. If you experience a bug in our app please report it to conditiondeltaapps@gmail.com and we will have it fixed as soon as possible. If youâre not satisfied we donât want your money so weâre offering a full refund for any reason.Capture your screen with Screenshot and Draw and get the features youâve been waiting for!If youâre phone or tablet is not rooted you will need to visit http://www.conditiondelta.com/screenshot-and-draw-instructions/ and download the Windows or Linux zip file.Or get them directly from these links:Windows https://www.box.com/s/7915d40b859addf3011cLinux  https://www.box.com/s/1b17a5b6783fdac09d17Once downloaded, follow these steps:    Turn on Debug Mode on your Phone or Tablet (Settings > Applications > Development > Check USB debugging    Connect your device to your PC    Run Run.bat (Windows) or Run.sh (Linux) Once the batch file has been successfully you will be able to use the app to take screenshots until you restart your phone. Once your phone has been reset you will need to run the batch file once again.If you experience any issues merging multiple screenshots together you can either make sure "Show Hint" is not checked or increase the interval to 3 seconds or more.Screenshot and Draw the best way to screen capture your android!**I cannot reply to comments so please send me an email with any questions or comments.** If you are not satisfied please send me you purchase info in an email and I will refund your money!

reviews.title: Distorted
reviews.comment: Works fine but the colors of my screen captures are way off. All reddish.
reviews.author: Mike Shuman

reviews.title: Works Great on my HTC EVO 4G (Wimax, not LTE)
reviews.comment: Easy to use, great screen shots, able to draw on the screenshot before saving, only $0.99, what\'s not to like.  BTW, very easy to download the batch file and run it on non-rooted phones, takes < 1 min.  I wanted to take screenshots to use as a back-up to my phone settings, screen layouts, app settings, etc.  I plan to root my phone soon, so these screenshots will make it much easier to \"re-build\" my phone after rooting, and for a new phone in the future.
reviews.author: Scott Curtis

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: just what I was looking for finally, I don\'t know why all phones can\'t be rooted except for greed. I bought the 99 cent app and it\'s great. I recommend it if you have a non rooted phone. thank you great work.
reviews.author: J. Shumard

reviews.title: This App Sucks
reviews.comment: This app does not work....by the time you find out it doesn\'t work it\'s to late for refund......stay away
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ifffy
reviews.comment: Good app but its stupid how every time my phone turns off i have to reconnect my phone to my computer & i cant get a refund !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Do a MAJOR fix please !!!!!!!!!!!!

reviews.title: suck
reviews.comment: doesn\'t work at all , seller no response
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Caution
reviews.comment: I downloaded this app a couple weeks ago and followed all the steps to the \"t\" and it is not working. I e-mailed the developer shortly after and have yet to hear back from them. Based on that alone, I do not recommend this app and I would use caution if you do decide to give it a shot.
reviews.author: Armando Quintero Jr

reviews.title: getting blank pic D=
reviews.comment: i get a black pics and and pics don\'t show where i put em to save at. help!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful App for Devs
reviews.comment: Needed an app that allowed me to quickly highlight specific UI elements to send to my team during testing. ICS/JB has the ability to capture screenshots, but I didn\'t want to have to open them up in another app or shoot them off to my desktop to make notes. Also the shake to screenshot feature is a lot easier than the awkward power + volume down combo if you need to capture something in a hurry. Overall very useful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally something that works
reviews.comment: This app is awesome, remove the trial version 1st before you download the paid version or you have a 50% chance of picking the wrong one though. That\'s my only gripe.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I want a refund
reviews.comment: Can\'t use this app; I did everything I was supposed to and it still doesn\'t work. I want a refund!
reviews.author: krystal cummings
